issue.title: Validate metadate according to INSPIRE
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

I found an interesting application to check metadata validity according to INSPIRE technical guidance ("PDF":http://inspire.jrc.ec.europa.eu/reports/ImplementingRules/metadata/MD_IR_and_ISO_20090218.pdf) here http://www.inspire-geoportal.eu/INSPIREValidatorClient/validate.do

It's an online application called *INSPIRE Validator client* that provides a user interface with a metadata file upload facility.

There's also an *INSPIRE Validator Service* that can be invoked by http request to validate Inspire Metadata (see tab "About" within the link given above.


_I imagine this feature could be added quite quicky in the CATALOG..._
